title: HTML tbody Tag
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The HTML <tbody> tag defines a group of table rows that form the body of the table content.

usageExamples.title: Basic tbody Example
usageExamples.description: Create a basic table body with two rows.

usageExamples.title: Nested tbody Example
usageExamples.description: Nest tbody within a table for additional styling or structure.
usageExamples.code: Nested tbody Row 1 Data 1 Nested tbody Row 1 Data 2
